channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 12:34 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 12:34 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
